comment: I should have listened to you guys.

If you can afford to not take this class and if this is the last professor available, do not take him. He will tell you to "study everything" for his tests and will provide no study guide. All tests had insane curves(30-40 pts). He will grade your homework terribly as well even if that's your only saving grace. Makes the course hard for no reason.

Makes discrete more difficult than it needs to be. Rushes material w/o any interruptions. Ask a question, you'd get a condescending response. Curves exams ~40pts as the class avg. was disastrously low (~15-19%). Harsh grader. Blames low class avg. on students. Looks for reactions during exams. Curved final w/ a huge range for students (20-40+ pts)

Do not take this professor. His grading is harsh, you either get full credit or none, only rarely do you get partial credit. His feedback is not helpful whatsoever. His lectures are poorly organized, so its impossible to understand. You're better off teaching yourself the material than attending one of his laughable "lectures."

He did not teach the content in a structured way, he didn't even explain what he was grading for in the exams 

Despite having an intuitive understanding of the content or theorems if you fail to apply them in precisely the right way with his personal buzz words he counts the whole question wrong 

Does not try to understand your explanation at all

If you have the choice between his class and a circus I would chose the taco stand down the street. Do not take him for Discrete Math this professor has made it extremely difficult to understand the material since the beginning. His feedback is terrible, and will not teach you, you would be better off by having your dog explain the material.

Class was difficult due to professor's awful teaching. Professor made no effort to apply different teaching methods after the majority the of class made it clear that his teaching method was not effective. Most of the class barely passed his exams. Each exam had an INSANE curve.(~+40%). I am a 3.9 GPA student, stay far away from this professor.

Please stay away...

Our first exam had around a 40 point curve. He gives no study guides (he just says "study everything") for his exams and does not let you make them up for any reason either. There are only two exams and a final (60% of grade). There is homework which will probably be my saving grace for this class (40%). Not a great lecturer.
